website_summaries.verdict: They cost a little more than others, but these sparring gloves give you a combination of fun colors and a durable design.
pros: Thick wrist strap is easier to grab and tighten than a thinner strap
Extra padding in this area of the glove
Uses a vinyl webbing overlay to provide additional durability
Designers included plenty of padding inside the gloves
Offered in two color choices and two weight options
cons: Not available in weights more than 12 ounces

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for women!
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands (7.5 inch palm circumference) and short fingers (6 3/8 inches from longest fingertip to base of palm) and have found glove shopping frustrating. The hand compartment fits well, but still allows room for wraps; the padding is good, as is the construction; my short fingers curl easily at the end of the glove but my fingernails don't hit the seam. The cuff doesn't go up to my elbow, as some gloves do, and has a wider, sturdy Velcro closure.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wiens

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I researched and researched and finally went with these gloves. So glad I did. I use them at I Love Kickboxing. They stablize my wrists. They don't feel clumsy like balloons. The womens fit is great. They will seem tight at first but you get used to it and love the stability. I tried on sobel (?) gloves. Felt like balloons and floppy. I like the thumb protection too.
customer_reviews.author: spudman

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves wife loves them. I'm making her wear them when she cooks me my chicken pot pie too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Manning

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves, tight though. My daughter has yet to break them in because she says they're tight and prefers her worn in gloves. My daughter is 9 and has kids sized hands.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Massey

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are AMAZING!!! great support on the wrist and knuckles. I use these gloves three times a week and I love them. Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Mikkol

customer_reviews.title: Shock absorbable
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are a very snug fit don't even need hand wraps but I put some on anyway because the wrap around wrist loop is kind of hard so hurts my tiny wrist bone that pops out. But, other than that great gloves that absorb shock very well. Received item super fast. Thank you for that!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are so great! They are sturdy, give excellent support and comfort, and they look great! I always get complimented on them!
customer_reviews.author: Krip

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I practice Muay Thai 5 days a week, and I love these gloves! They are durable, comfortable and look good all at once!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy and and form fitting to my hands. My punches have a pop when I land them
customer_reviews.author: BLR

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: Came to me in poor condition, inner lining was ripped the quality of the leather is poor and the wrist support is nonexistent. I had heard great things about them but it didn't hold true for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W. Lopez Roche

customer_reviews.title: Hard as rocks and much too small
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 12 oz. Good wrist support, but they were too small for my hands (and my hands are pretty petite). My fingers were getting jammed when I was punching because my fingers were stuffed at the end of the glove. Also, the gloves were HARD AS ROCKS. I bought them for sparring, but they would have needed hours and hours of bagwork to be broken in. Between the size and the firmness of the padding, I wouldn’t recommend them to an average sized woman or a competing boxer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Ringside Women's IMF Tech Boxing Training Sparring Gloves
product_meta.description: Female pugilists can now rest easy in knowing that there is a glove specifically made for them. The sleek and compact design caters exactly to a woman's needs. Injected-molded foam padding protects the user and a 4" wide, hook & loop, wrap-around strap secures the wrist in place.
feature_bullets: A leather/textured vinyl combo shell provides durability and good looks
The exclusive vinyl overlay webbing on the underside of the gloves provides additional reinforcement during impact
Mesh promotes evaporation of sweat and water
